name: Professional Darts 3D
description:
Professional Darts 3D is a game of perfectly tuned physics game with real environment based on user skills. Standard game Scoring and standard game rules applied.

Professional Darts 3D is a complete game for every kind of users varies ages to ages.
Professional Darts 3D consist of 3 mode i-e 301,501 and Cricket. You can practice to become a good player first in practice mode and then can challenge your friend in multi player game feature. Great features of Artificial Intelligence has been added for users who wants to play with Computer in "Player vs Bot Mode".

Game Features:
Very smooth & perfect game controls
Real environment just like you are playing actual game
Awesome graphics & stunning sound effects
3 Game Modes
- 301
- 501
- Cricket
3 Play Modes:
- Practice Mode
- Two Players Mode
- Player vs Bot Mode

User can play with his friend in multi player option by typing your name you can enjoy the true essence of Professional Darts 3D.
You can play against computer with high profile Artificial Intelligence.

How to Play:
Just Swipe the screen to through Dart with accuracy towards Dart board.

Play and let your friends and family play this game and challenge your friend with your highest score.
